text:
CHAPTER 6-10 
TREE PESTICIDE APPLICATORS LICENSE 
 
 
6-10-1  
DEFINITIONS 
Owner:  Is a natural person who owns the property on which the treated tree(s) or 
shrub(s) are located. 
 
Tree Pesticide Applicator:  A person who engages in the business or sale of applying or 
treating trees or shrubs for disease. 
 
 
 
Legislative History:  
 
 
 
Ordinance No. 604, 5/6/20  
 
6-10-2  
LICENSE REQUIRED 
All pesticide treatment of trees or shrubs located within the city right of way must be 
performed by a Licensed Tree Pesticide Applicator licensed by the City of Brandon, 
South Dakota. 
 
 
 
Legislative History:  
 
 
 
Ordinance No. 604, 5/6/20  
 
 
6-10-3  
LICENSE FEE 
The Brandon City Council may, from time to time, establish a license fee by resolution. 
 
 
 
Legislative History:  
 
 
 
Ordinance No. 604, 5/6/20  
 
 
6-10-4  
LICENSE TERM AND RENEWAL 
All licenses issued under the provisions of this chapter are annual and expire on 
December 31st of every year regardless of issue date.  All renewal fees shall be paid prior 
to the license being renewed. 
 
 
 
Legislative History:  
 
 
 
Ordinance No. 604, 5/6/20  
 
 
6-10-5  
TREATED TREES TO BE MARKED AND REGISTERED 
Pursuant to 13-1-18, all treated trees must be marked with an approved tag on the street 
side of the tree and registered with the City of Brandon. 
 
 
 
Legislative History:  
 
 
 
Ordinance No. 604, 5/6/20  
 
 
6-10-6  
SUSPENSION, DENIAL OR REVOCATION OF LICENSE 

The application for a license or a current license may be denied, suspended or revoked in 
accordance with the procedure outlined in Brandon City Ordinance 6-2-9, 6-2-10, 6-2-11, 
and 6-2-12. 
 
 
 
Legislative History:  
 
 
 
Ordinance No. 604, 5/6/20
